MemoryInfobox.description: 'The rapacious Piracy|pirate queen Xenia asked Kassandra to find a Makedonian bracelet left by a foreign dignitary for the gods at one of the several sanctuaries.'

General_Description: '''Sacred Vows''' was a virtual representation of one of [[Kassandra]]'s genetic memories, relived by [[Layla Hassan]] through the Portable [[Animus|Animus HR-8.5]].
Section_Description: Returning to the [[Piracy|pirate]] queen [[Xenia]], Kassandra was tasked to find another treasure.
Section_Dialogue:
Kassandra approached Xenia again.
*'''Xenia:''' ''You flew like the west wind in retrieving my [[Golden Feather of Ajax|golden]] [[eagle]] [[feather]]. Now, fetch me another rarity.''
<tabber>
|-|Sure, I'm up for the job.=
*'''Kassandra:''' ''Sure, I'm up for whatever challenge you have in mind.''
|-|I'm not interested now.=
*'''Kassandra:''' ''Sorry, Xenia. Another time, perhaps.''
Xenia, happy, punched a solid fist in the air as Kassandra returned.
*'''Xenia:''' ''You're back. Good. Will you find the [[Makedonia]]n bracelet for my pleasure?''
(Back to dialogue choice one)
</tabber>
*'''Xenia:''' ''A wealthy noble from [[Makedonia]] is visiting various sanctuaries throughout the [[Aegean Sea|Aegean]], looking for the most sacred to make a great offering.''
*'''Kassandra:''' ''Oh? What would he offer the gods, and why?''
*'''Xenia:''' ''The why is unimportant. Perhaps he asks the gods to make his [[drachma]]e multiply, or to harden his cock.''
Kassandra laughed.
*'''Xenia:''' ''But the offering is said to be crafted golden bracelet, as beautiful as [[Aphrodite]], with workmanship to rival that of [[Hephaistos]]. It would look better on my wrist than on an altar.''
(If players choose "Where are the sacred sites?")
*'''Kassandra:''' ''So, how far do I have to travel to find these sacred sites?''
*'''Xenia:''' ''I had one of my loyal crew, [[Anaximander]], draw several maps to show you the locations. He's clever with a stylus.''
(If players choose "What are the risks?")
*'''Kassandra:''' ''Any [[guard]]s at these holy sites?''
*'''Xenia:''' ''Probably not, though I suppose you risk offending the gods and earning their enmity for all time. If you take stock in that sort of thing.''
*'''Kassandra:''' ''Good enough for now. I'll keep an eye out for the bracelet you want.''
Sometime later, Kassandra returned with the bracelet.
*'''Xenia:''' ''Ah, my lovely [[Mercenary|misthios]]. What news?''
<tabber>
|-|I expect to be paid for my time.=
Kassandra gives it to her.
*'''Kassandra:''' ''The time I sink into finding these trinkets for you had better be amply rewarded.''
*'''Xenia:''' ''Does my little [[hoplite]] feel undervalued?''
*'''Kassandra:''' ''I don't see you risking your life over wild waters.''
*'''Xenia:''' ''Ha! In my youth I sailed every sea and explored every island as if driven by [[Poseidon]]. But now I carry a burden like [[Atlas]]. Don't worry, Kassandra. I have a fat purse for your efforts.''
|-|I found it for you.=
*'''Kassandra:''' ''An amazing piece. You will look magnificent with it, like Aphrodite herself.''
*'''Xenia:''' ''I am no soft and simple plaything.''
*'''Kassandra:''' ''No, of course not. It will look mighty -''
Xenia groans in disgust.
*'''Xenia:''' ''Stop trying to insert your tongue in my ass.''
</tabber>
Section_Outcome: Kassandra helped Xenia to recovered the highly treasured Makedonian bracelet
